messages.content: The big issues of Brexit and independence dominate media coverage of this election, but every day when I am knocking on doors local people tell me they are looking for an MP who cares about our area, and will be active in our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our education system used to be the very best in the world, it's just average. The Liberal Democrats will make a transformational investment in Scottish education to change this.

Our health services were world class, now waiting times are too long, targets are being missed and many people can't access mental health care when they need it. We will boost spending for mental health treatment.

issues.education: Our education system used to be the very best in the world, it's just average. The Liberal Democrats will make a transformational investment in Scottish education to change this.
issues.health: Our health services were world class, now waiting times are too long, targets are being missed and many people can't access mental health care when they need it. We will boost spending for mental health treatment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe that I can make a difference to people's lives in North East Fife.

images.caption: Elizabeth Riches, Scottish Liberal Democrat candidate for North East Fife.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. If you want an experienced local MP who has a track record of getting things done for our area in Parliament, please lend me your vote on 8 June.
